body_html:
I'm getting the same error on import tensorflow as tf. The program says "Illegal Command" and exits. No further info.

I'm running on a ARMv6 raspberry pi, installed from http://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-pi-zero/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/output-artifacts/tensorflow-1.7.0-cp27-none-any.whl using the --no-cache-dir flag. The install went off without a hitch, but I get this runtime error.

with GDB (which I'm not super familiar with)

[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libthread_db.so.1".

Program received signal SIGILL, Illegal instruction.
0xb4c21b54 in tensorflow::TensorShapeProto_Dim::SharedCtor() ()
   from /home/pi/[my project]/.virtualenv/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so
body_text:
I'm getting the same error on import tensorflow as tf. The program says "Illegal Command" and exits. No further info.
I'm running on a ARMv6 raspberry pi, installed from http://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-pi-zero/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/output-artifacts/tensorflow-1.7.0-cp27-none-any.whl using the --no-cache-dir flag. The install went off without a hitch, but I get this runtime error.
with GDB (which I'm not super familiar with)
[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libthread_db.so.1".

Program received signal SIGILL, Illegal instruction.
0xb4c21b54 in tensorflow::TensorShapeProto_Dim::SharedCtor() ()
   from /home/pi/[my project]/.virtualenv/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so
body:
I'm getting the same error on `import tensorflow as tf`. The program says "Illegal Command" and exits. No further info. 

I'm running on a ARMv6 raspberry pi, installed from `http://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-pi-zero/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/output-artifacts/tensorflow-1.7.0-cp27-none-any.whl` using the `--no-cache-dir` flag. The install went off without a hitch, but I get this runtime error. 

with GDB (which I'm not super familiar with)
```
[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libthread_db.so.1".

Program received signal SIGILL, Illegal instruction.
0xb4c21b54 in tensorflow::TensorShapeProto_Dim::SharedCtor() ()
   from /home/pi/[my project]/.virtualenv/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so
```
